header_text: You're visiting the doctor for a follow-up appointment. As you describe some recent symptoms you've been having, you notice the doctor is typing a lot. When they look up at you, they have an expression of calmness.

elements.Text: Do you feel that the doctor is comforting you?

elements.name: You're visiting the doctor for a follow-up appointment. As you describe some recent symptoms you've been having, you notice the doctor is typing a lot. When they look up at you, they have an expression of calmness._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
